oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Pharmacokinetic Disposition of an Immediate Release Aminophylline and a Sustained Release Theophylline Formulation in Adult Horses
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Goetz, T. E.
Munsiff, I. J.
McKiernan, B. C.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: theophylline
aminophylline
release time
graduate research
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The pharmacokinetic disposition of theophylline was determined in 6 horses following the administration of aminophylline IV (9.94 mg/kg as theophylline), aminophylline tablets (9.94 mg/kg as theophylline) and Theo-dur tablets (20 mg/kg as theophylline).
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: AAVPT Biennial Symposia; Sixth Biennial Symposium; 124
